articles.title: Guinea and Central African Republic elections: Leaders aim to consolidate power at in two polls in Africa - BBC
articles.description: The leaders of Guinea and the Central African Republic aim to consolidate power after Sunday's polls.
articles.content:
Paul MellyWest Africa analyst
Voters in Guinea and the Central African Republic will get to vote for president 
On Sunday, citizens of Guinea and the Central African Republic (CAR) will go to the p… [+6667 chars]
